name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Sweet Serenade
description:
'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Sweet Serenade' (stylization of うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪ Sweet Serenade) is a rhythmic otome video game made for the PlayStation Portable on February 10th, 2011. It is the third entry to be made for the main series, which in turn reintroduced the dateable characters from Class S (including Tsukimiya Ringo and a secret character), songs, CGs (illustrated scenes), as well as the ability to carry on special data from Uta no Prince-sama Repeat via local communication. It received a combined special edition with 'Amazing Aria' (second entry) for both the PS Vita and Nintendo Switch.

*Nanami Haruka has found her partner and the voice to bring her compositions to life. Yet challenges just don't stop there. To pass the exams, she has to win the graduation auditions with her partner. When emotions get into music, they may make the melody sweeter, but couple fights could stump your work in progress. Learn to deal with the princes as a girlfriend and combine all aspects of romance into your songs.

(*Source of Description - Uta no Prince-sama Wiki; 'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ -Sweet Serenade-')
